list.fetchTagsFailed: Failed to fetch tags, please check network connection

dialog.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this preset? This action cannot be undone.

form.name: Preset Name
form.title: Title
form.avatarTip: Recommended: Square image, will be compressed to under 500KB
form.tagsPlaceholder: Press Enter or comma to add tags
form.tagsHelper: Separate with comma or Enter, max 8 tags
form.author: Author
form.descriptionHelper: Enter a brief description of the preset

cloud.sharedInfo: This preset is shared to cloud. Use "Sync to Cloud" button to sync your changes after saving.
cloud.unlinkWarning: This preset was downloaded from cloud. Editing will unlink it and you won't be able to sync updates.
cloud.unlinkConfirm: Are you sure you want to continue editing and unlink from cloud?
cloud.addDescriptionFirst: Please add a description before sharing
cloud.shareConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to share this preset to the cloud? Once shared, it can be downloaded by other instances.
cloud.shareInfo: After sharing, others can download and use your preset.
cloud.sfwConfirm: I confirm this is Safe For Work (SFW) content compliant with community rules
cloud.termsConfirm: I have read and agree to
cloud.revokeWarning: Revoking share will remove this preset from cloud. Other instances may no longer be able to download it.
cloud.revokeConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to revoke sharing?
cloud.syncConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to sync local changes to cloud? This will overwrite the version in the cloud.
cloud.syncWarning: Syncing will overwrite the cloud version with your local version.
cloud.refreshStatusDetails: Updated shared status for {{updated}} presets, total {{total}} presets in cloud
